Class EnzymeKinetics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.biology.biochemistry.EnzymeKinetics
public class EnzymeKinetics extends Object
Michaelis-Menten enzyme kinetics.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    findKm(double[] substrateConcs, double[] velocities, double vMax)
    Calculates Km from half-maximal velocity.
    static double[]
    lineweaverBurkParams(double vMax, double km)
    Lineweaver-Burk linearization (double reciprocal). 1/V = (Km/Vmax)(1/[S]) + 1/Vmax

    Calculates reaction velocity using Michaelis-Menten equation.

  • Method Details

    • velocity

      public static double velocity(double vMax, double km, double substrateConcentration)
      Calculates reaction velocity using Michaelis-Menten equation. V = Vmax * [S] / (Km + [S])
      Parameters:
      vMax - Maximum velocity
      km - Michaelis constant
      substrateConcentration - [S]
      Returns:
      Reaction velocity

    • lineweaverBurkParams

      public static double[] lineweaverBurkParams(double vMax, double km)
      Lineweaver-Burk linearization (double reciprocal). 1/V = (Km/Vmax)(1/[S]) + 1/Vmax
      Returns:
      double[2] = {slope, intercept}

    • findKm

      public static double findKm(double[] substrateConcs, double[] velocities, double vMax)
      Calculates Km from half-maximal velocity. At V = Vmax/2, [S] = Km

    • velocityWithCompetitiveInhibitor

      public static double velocityWithCompetitiveInhibitor(double vMax, double km, double substrateConc, double inhibitorConc, double ki)
      Competitive inhibition. V = Vmax * [S] / (Km * (1 + [I]/Ki) + [S])
